meanings.sent1: She is the cleverest student in the class.
meanings.sent2: The cleverest way to solve the puzzle is to think outside the box.
meanings.sent3: The cleverest squirrel in the park always finds a way to get extra nuts.
meanings.sent4: Her cleverest disguise was dressing up as a potted plant.
meanings.sent5: The cleverest detective in town never misses a clue.

meanings.definition: Skilled at achieving one's goals through deceit or trickery
meanings.sent1: He is known as the cleverest con artist in the city.
meanings.sent2: The cleverest thieves always find a way to outsmart the security system.
meanings.sent3: The cleverest magician in the world can make things disappear in a blink.
meanings.sent4: Her cleverest move was convincing everyone she was innocent.
meanings.sent5: The cleverest fox in the forest always manages to steal the farmer's chickens.
